resources.name: XeroAPI (Github Full)
resources.description: Insomnia collection with a growing percentage of all the [XeroAPI](https://developer.xero.com/documentation/) endpoints built out. Plug in your unique API app params to start exploring the API.

headers.name: Authorization
headers.value: OAuth oauth_consumer_key='',    oauth_token='',    oauth_signature_method='RSA-SHA1',    oauth_signature='',    oauth_timestamp='',    oauth_nonce='',    oauth_version='1.0'

resources.url: https://api.xero.com/api.xro/2.0/Prepayments?where=Contact.ContactID = GUID("0bcd1d70-5c06-40c3-8007-b42c81ffecf8") OR Contact.ContactID = GUID("43d1337e-4360-4589-9a76-1d0538c4ce6f") AND Status == "AUTHORISED" AND Type == "RECEIVE-PREPAYMENT"
resources.name: Get Prepayments ( where Contact ID )

data.refresh_token: copy/paste refresh token if you want to test manual refresh/revoke methods
